name: VAO
description:
Over 80% of our business comes from our current clients' referrals.
VAO is a software house founded in 2004 and working closely with international and domestic customers. We are web design, web development, mobile development & consulting agency that has launched over 350 projects in: 
Laravel
Drupal
Magento
Serverless
Node.js,
iOS (Swift) - mobile apps
Android (Kotlin) - mobile apps
Flutter
We have a team for Chatbot development. Our Chatbots have natural language processing. We have our own engine for Facebook, Whatsapp and simple WebChat. Our Chatbot are used in eCommerce, tour guides, travel and other industries.
We have also very experienced Java Enterprise team specialized in:
Big Data
Cloud Solutions
Blockchain (Blockchain with MultiChain on AWS EC, Hyperledger Fabric 1.0 and IBM Blockchain, BlockCypher’s Ethereum API)
We provide wide range of services related to robotics, machine learning and artificial intelligence. Our daily duties include high level planning of robots movement and robot task scheduling. We create also IoT devices for many markets. 
Our main markets:
Media
Health care
Consumer products
Information technology
Leisure
Automotive
We will be more than happy to answer those question and any other you may have. To find out more visit https://www.vao.pl
